subject: [perl #42353] [TODO] perform a dynamic lookup if needed in pic_infix__() op
body:
# New Ticket Created by  Paul Cochrane 
# Please include the string:  [perl #42353]
# in the subject line of all future correspondence about this issue. 
# 


In src/ops/pic.ops at the pic_infix__() op there is the todo item:

"if we got too often here just do a dynamic lookup"

This needs to be implemented.
